You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesN N] > &nharr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&nhArr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21ce/index.htm U+021CE].
  * `&nharr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21ae/index.htm U+021AE].
